briefTitle: CT-Angiography Prior to DIEP Flap Breast Reconstruction
officialTitle: CT-Angiography Prior to DIEP Flap Breast Reconstruction a Randomized Controlled Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Planning breast reconstruction with DIEP flap
* Age 18 to 75 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* Mild to moderate loss of kidney function (Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR) \< 60)
* Decisionally challenged
* Pregnant
* Hepatic failure
